articles.title: Asia-Pacific stocks mixed as China's factory and services activity contracts - CNBC
articles.description: Shares in the Asia-Pacific were mixed on Monday as China factory activity missed expectations, and as the market looks ahead to the U.S. Fed meeting this week.

articles.title: Philippines' Marcos to inspect storm damage as death toll hits 98 - Reuters
articles.description: Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr is set on Monday to fly over flood-submerged districts to inspect the damage after Tropical Storm Nalgae barrelled across the Southeast Asian country over the weekend, killing at least 98 people.
